data.why:
I am a perl instructor in the hitech-college of israel
    (http://www.hi-tech.co.il/college/index.htm) I plan to upload simple
    utilities to help beginners. the first one will be: hprint, a simple
    function that wil print hashes with many options.

    I was one of the speakers in last YAPC::EU::2003 and I'm going to
    speak in YAPC::ISRAL::2004 about mpi programming with perl .

    Thanks in advance --Itzik
